get.description: Returns a single article identified by slug. If slug == "feed", the request is delegated to the authenticated feed handler which may return 401 Unauthorized.

delete.description: Deletes the article identified by the slug. This endpoint is registered under the authenticated articles routes and requires authentication.

parameters.description: Slug identifier of the article to delete
parameters.name: slug

post.description: Marks the article identified by the path parameter 'slug' as favorited by the current authenticated user and returns the article. Returns 200 with the article, or 404 if the slug is invalid.

parameters.description: Slug of the article to unfavorite
parameters.name: slug

200.description: Successful response with the unfavorited article
